name: @hurumap/config
description: HURUmap configuration of supported values and more
author: CodeForAfrica

scripts.publish:local: mkdir -p ../publish-local && yarn pack --filename ../publish-local/$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tar && cd ../publish-local && tar xopf $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.tar --one-top-level=$npm_package_name && cd $npm_package_name && yarn link
